Suspension descriptor:
Other – continuing, persistent behaviour posing unacceptable 
risk to another person's learning and/or wellbeing

Other – destruction of property that poses unacceptable risk 
to health and safety

Possession, supply or use of a suspected drug or

Serious criminal behaviour related to the school
Use of implement as a weapon
